Sprint 005: AquaBook Fase 4 - Dashboard + Gráficos Frontend. 5 tarefas, 21 story points. 2026-04-11 a 2026-04-24.
Sprint 006: AquaBook Fase 5 - WebSocket + Alertas + Notificações. 6 tarefas, 21 story points. 2026-04-25 a 2026-05-08.
